title: Stuck on the authenticating message
body: Ive been trying to sign into league for the whole week. Ive looked at every support page and video league has to offer but i still cant sign in. Ive managed to get into league twice. i have no idea how i got in but it happended. After i signed out suprise suprise i couldnt get back in. All i want to do is grind some league. Its just stuck on the authenticating message and nothing is happening. Ive asked for help from riot and submitted a ticket but of course ive gotten no response. Please suggest something i havent tried. Please help me :)

replies.body:
I know you mentioned you looked at every support page, but I do have to make sure: have you already tried the solutions provided in the [**Troubleshooting Connection Issues**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) Riot Support article? If that didn't work, I'd also recommend trying the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) if you haven't done so already. 

Once you've exhausted both of these options, I'd finally recommend [**submitting a ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to Player Support and troubleshooting further with a Player Support Tech. Let us know what works for you!
Update your network drivers, worked for me.

Support usually responds to tickets in under 24 hours, 48 if they're busy. The only common reason they wouldn't would be there was an error with ticket submission or you have bumped the ticket (replied before receiving a response) which puts you back at the bottom of the queue, so if it's been longer than that it's a bit unusual.

As for your issue, connection trouble isn't my forte, beyond connecting to ethernet and checking your ISPs site for any info on maintenance or anything of the sort support is probably your best bet.
